vcl_vector< unsigned int > vepl1_histogram (vil1_image const &)
 pixel value histogram of 2D image, stored in a 256x1 output image.

Detailed Description

pixel value histogram of 2D image

The vepl1_histogram class creates a pixel value histogram of a 2D image and writes it into a vcl_vector<unsigned int>.

The number of bins for ubyte images is 256, for ushort images 65536, and for float or double image it is 1000.

Note that, as opposed to vipl_histogram, the output bins are initialised to 0, as one expects.

Author:
Peter Vanroose, K.U.Leuven (ESAT/PSI)
Date:
28 April 2001
    Modifications
     25-May-2002 - Peter Vanroose - changed return type from vil1_image to vcl_vector<uint>
